title: Riot: Game mode Idea "Multii Worlds"
body:
Basically its SR but all players can pick any champ they want.   In Champ select you let both sides chat with each other.  All picks are visible while selecting.

If one player picks Sona any other play on ether team can also pick Sona.

Its like All for One where if you wanted you can have 10 Yasuos.

replies.body: Why. Just sounds like OfA but worse.
